member.name: T:PDFtoImage.Compatibility.Conversion
member.summary: Provides methods to render PDFs into images. Used for backward compatibility.
Renders a single page of a given PDF and saves it as a JPEG.
member.param: The output image file path.
The PDF encoded as Base64.
The password for opening the PDF. Use if no password is needed.
The specific page to be converted.
The DPI scaling to use for rasterization of the PDF.
The width of the desired . Use if the original width should be used.
The height of the desired . Use if the original height should be used.
Specifies whether annotations be rendered.
Specifies whether form filling will be rendered.
Specifies that or should be adjusted for aspect ratio (either one must be ).
Specifies the rotation at 90 degree intervals.
Specifies which parts of the PDF should be anti-aliasing for rendering.
Specifies the background color. Defaults to .

Specifies that or should be adjusted for aspect ratio (either one must be ).
Specifies the rotation at 90 degree intervals.
Specifies which parts of the PDF should be anti-aliasing for rendering.
Specifies the background color. Defaults to .

member.name: M:PDFtoImage.Compatibility.Conversion.ToImage(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,PDFtoImage.PdfRotation,PDFtoImage.PdfAntiAliasing,System.Nullable{SkiaSharp.SKColor})
member.summary: Renders a single page of a given PDF into an image.
member.param: The PDF encoded as Base64.
The password for opening the PDF. Use if no password is needed.
The specific page to be converted.
The DPI scaling to use for rasterization of the PDF.
The width of the desired . Use if the original width should be used.
The height of the desired . Use if the original height should be used.
Specifies whether annotations be rendered.
Specifies whether form filling will be rendered.
Specifies that or should be adjusted for aspect ratio (either one must be ).
Specifies the rotation at 90 degree intervals.
Specifies which parts of the PDF should be anti-aliasing for rendering.
Specifies the background color. Defaults to .
member.returns: The converted PDF page as an image.

member.summary: Renders all pages of a given PDF into images.
member.param: The PDF encoded as Base64.
The password for opening the PDF. Use if no password is needed.
The DPI scaling to use for rasterization of the PDF.
The width of the all pages. Use if the original width (per page) should be used.
The height of all pages. Use if the original height (per page) should be used.
Specifies whether annotations be rendered.
Specifies whether form filling will be rendered.
Specifies that or should be adjusted for aspect ratio (either one must be ).
Specifies the rotation at 90 degree intervals.
Specifies which parts of the PDF should be anti-aliasing for rendering.
Specifies the background color. Defaults to .
member.returns: The rendered PDF pages as images.

member.name: T:PDFtoImage.Exceptions.PdfCannotOpenFileException
member.summary: Thrown if the PDF file was not found or could not be opened.

member.name: T:PDFtoImage.Exceptions.PdfException
member.summary: Base class for all PDF related exceptions.

member.name: T:PDFtoImage.Exceptions.PdfInvalidFormatException
member.summary: Thrown if the PDF format is invalid or corrupted.

member.name: T:PDFtoImage.Exceptions.PdfPageNotFoundException
member.summary: Thrown if the PDF does not contain the given page number.

member.name: T:PDFtoImage.Exceptions.PdfPasswordProtectedException
member.summary: Thrown if the PDF requires a password and the given password was not given or incorrect.

member.name: T:PDFtoImage.Exceptions.PdfUnknownException
member.summary: Thrown on unknown PDF errors.

member.name: T:PDFtoImage.Exceptions.PdfUnsupportedSecuritySchemeException
member.summary: Thrown if the PDF file uses an unsupported security scheme.

member.name: M:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF_LoadCustomDocument(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Opens a document using a .NET Stream. Allows opening huge PDFs without loading them into memory first.
member.param: The input Stream. Don't dispose prior to closing the pdf.
Password, if the PDF is protected. Can be null.
Retrieves an IntPtr to the COM object for the Stream. The caller must release this with Marshal.Release prior to Disposing the Stream.
member.returns: An IntPtr to the FPDF_DOCUMENT object.

member.name: T:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDFBitmap
member.summary: A number indicating for bitmap format.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDFBitmap.Gray
member.summary: Gray scale bitmap, one byte per pixel.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDFBitmap.BGR
member.summary: 3 bytes per pixel, byte order: blue, green, red.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDFBitmap.BGRx
member.summary: 4 bytes per pixel, byte order: blue, green, red, unused.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDFBitmap.BGRA
member.summary: 4 bytes per pixel, byte order: blue, green, red, alpha.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF.ANNOT
member.summary: Set if annotations are to be rendered.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF.LCD_TEXT
member.summary: Set if using text rendering optimized for LCD display. This flag will only take effect if anti-aliasing is enabled for text.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF.NO_NATIVETEXT
member.summary: Don't use the native text output available on some platforms.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF.GRAYSCALE
member.summary: Grayscale output.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF.DEBUG_INFO
member.summary: Obsolete, has no effect, retained for compatibility.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF.NO_CATCH
member.summary: Obsolete, has no effect, retained for compatibility.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF.RENDER_LIMITEDIMAGECACHE
member.summary: Limit image cache size.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF.RENDER_FORCEHALFTONE
member.summary: Always use halftone for image stretching.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF.PRINTING
member.summary: Render for printing.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF.RENDER_NO_SMOOTHTEXT
member.summary: Set to disable anti-aliasing on text. This flag will also disable LCD optimization for text rendering.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF.RENDER_NO_SMOOTHIMAGE
member.summary: Set to disable anti-aliasing on images.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF.RENDER_NO_SMOOTHPATH
member.summary: Set to disable anti-aliasing on paths.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF.REVERSE_BYTE_ORDER
member.summary: Set whether to render in a reverse Byte order, this flag is only used when rendering to a bitmap.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF.CONVERT_FILL_TO_STROKE
member.summary: Set whether fill paths need to be stroked. This flag is only used when FPDF_COLORSCHEME is passed in, since with a single fill color for paths the boundaries of adjacent fill paths are less visible.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF_ERR.SUCCESS
member.summary: No error.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF_ERR.UNKNOWN
member.summary: Unknown error.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF_ERR.FILE
member.summary: File not found or could not be opened.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF_ERR.FORMAT
member.summary: File not in PDF format or corrupted.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF_ERR.PASSWORD
member.summary: Password required or incorrect password.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF_ERR.SECURITY
member.summary: Unsupported security scheme.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.Internals.NativeMethods.FPDF_ERR.PAGE
member.summary: Page not found or content error.

member.name: P:PDFtoImage.Internals.PdfDocument.PageSizes
member.summary: Size of each page in the PDF document.
Renders a page of the PDF document to an image.
member.param: Number of the page to render.
Width of the rendered image.
Height of the rendered image.
Horizontal DPI.
Vertical DPI.
Rotation.
Flags used to influence the rendering.
Render form fills.
Change and depending on the given and .
The background color used for the output.
Specifies the bounds for the page relative to . This can be used for clipping (bounds inside of page) or additional margins (bounds outside of page).
member.returns: The rendered image.

member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:PDFtoImage.PdfAntiAliasing
member.summary: Specifies which parts of the PDF should be rendered with anti-aliasing.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfAntiAliasing.None
member.summary: No anti-aliasing.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfAntiAliasing.Text
member.summary: Use anti-aliasing on text.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfAntiAliasing.Images
member.summary: Use anti-aliasing on images.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfAntiAliasing.Paths
member.summary: Use anti-aliasing on paths.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfAntiAliasing.All
member.summary: Use anti-aliasing on everything.

member.name: T:PDFtoImage.PdfRotation
member.summary: Specifies the rotation of pages shown in the PDF renderer.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfRotation.Rotate0
member.summary: No rotation.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfRotation.Rotate90
member.summary: Rotated 90 degrees clockwise.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfRotation.Rotate180
member.summary: Rotated 180 degrees.

member.name: F:PDFtoImage.PdfRotation.Rotate270
member.summary: Rotated 90 degrees counter-clockwise.

member.name: T:PDFtoImage.RenderOptions
member.summary: Contains all relevant information to render a PDF page into an image.
member.param: The DPI scaling to use for rasterization of the PDF.
The width of the desired page. Use if the original width should be used.
The height of the desired page. Use if the original height should be used.
Specifies whether annotations be rendered.
Specifies whether form filling will be rendered.
Specifies that or should be adjusted for aspect ratio (either one must be ).
Specifies the rotation at 90 degree intervals.
Specifies which parts of the PDF should be anti-aliasing for rendering.
Specifies the background color. Defaults to .
Specifies the bounds for the page relative to . This can be used for clipping (bounds inside of page) or additional margins (bounds outside of page).

Specifies that the PDF should be rendered as several segments and merged into the final image. This can help in cases where the output image is too large, causing corrupted images (e.g. missing text) or crashes.

member.summary: Contains all relevant information to render a PDF page into an image.

The height of the desired page. Use if the original height should be used.
Specifies whether annotations be rendered.
Specifies whether form filling will be rendered.
Specifies that or should be adjusted for aspect ratio (either one must be ).
Specifies the rotation at 90 degree intervals.
Specifies which parts of the PDF should be anti-aliasing for rendering.
Specifies the background color. Defaults to .
Specifies the bounds for the page relative to . This can be used for clipping (bounds inside of page) or additional margins (bounds outside of page).

Specifies that the PDF should be rendered as several segments and merged into the final image. This can help in cases where the output image is too large, causing corrupted images (e.g. missing text) or crashes.

member.summary: Specifies the bounds for the page relative to . This can be used for clipping (bounds inside of page) or additional margins (bounds outside of page).

member.name: P:PDFtoImage.RenderOptions.UseTiling
member.summary: Specifies that the PDF should be rendered as several segments and merged into the final image. This can help in cases where the output image is too large, causing corrupted images (e.g. missing text) or crashes.
